name: Ksiaze
overview: Książę is a turn based historical strategy game, similar to Defender of the Crown. The game is set in Poland in the thirteenth century. The aim is to unite the country. Player can choose one of the four rulers with various features. Ruler has the possibility to support other provinces, dispatch legation, determine the amount of taxes, read the reports of each province, watch the map, create armies, initiate military campaign, build towns or castles and hear with the opposition. In addition the game features a variety of random events, such as the invasion of a foreign army.
